channel.title: usethis shiny on the way we R
channel.description: Recent content in usethis shiny on the way we R

item.title: {datamods}: Shiny modules to import data
item.description: An R package that provides custom-made modules to import data into a Shiny app. Overview This package provides custom shiny modules to import data from various sources and update variables in the dataset. The modules can be used in any standard shiny app. There are four modules at the moment. import-globalenv import-file import-copypaste import-googlesheets More on the github page In Collaboration with This is a project funded by dreamRs: Data science with a capital R.
